title: Stereotype threat says students no doing well if

content.prompt: Research on stereotype threat indicates that students might not do as well as they can on a test if

choices.label: they are informed that people of their ethnicity, age, or gender usually do not perform well on the tests
they are forced to take a test that is known to have low test-retest reliability
other students perceive them to be of a minority ethnic group
the test does not have standardized administration or scoring procedures

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
